name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForChronicObstructivePulmonaryDiseaseExacerbation
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Exacerbation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) exacerbation.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes COPD with acute exacerbations.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes chronic pulmonary emphysema, chronic bronchitis without exacerbation, bronchiectasis, obstructive bronchiolitis, and COPD with acute respiratory infections (e.g., Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with acute lower respiratory infection).)
